name: collision
content:
collision noun
(ACCIDENT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] an accident that happens when two vehicles hit each other with force: There has been a collision on the southbound stretch of the motorway. Two drivers were killed in a head-on (= direct) collision between a car and a taxi last night. The cyclist was in a collision with a bus. Synonyms
